_id.description: Automatically generated object_id as primary key.

authorId.description: Id of the user who created the comment.

parentId.description: If the comment is nested (in another comment), this field will hold the _id of the parent comment. Optional field, where being blank means it is a root comment.

likes.description: Array holding the user_id of all the users who liked the comment.

items.description: _id of the user who liked the comment

createdAt.description: Timestamp with the comment's creation date

updatedAt.description: Timestamp with the comment's last update date
